statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT city, state, zip_code FROM customers WHERE state='California'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='New York'
SELECT first_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE zip_code=12345
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state, zip_code, email FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, zip_code FROM customers WHERE zip_code BETWEEN 90000 AND 95000 ORDER BY zip_code DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'Chicago' AND state = 'Illinois';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE state = 'Texas' AND city = 'Dallas' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_total_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' AND state = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state, country FROM customers WHERE state='CA'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, address, contact_number FROM customers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, address, contact_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.city = 'New York' AND oi.quantity > 1 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC
